name: Bertrand Russell
notable_ideas: Analytic philosophy, Automated theorem proving, Axiom of reducibility, Barber paradox, Berry paradox, Connective (logic), Definite description, Descriptivist theory of names, Double negation, Existential fallacy, Fictional beings and reference failure, Knowledge by acquaintance, Knowledge by description, logical atomism, Logical form, Philosophical logic, Propositional calculus, Neutral monism, Paradoxes of set theory, Peano-Russell notation, Propositional formula, Self-refuting idea, Quantification, Round square copula, Russell conjugation, Russell's paradox, Russell's teapot, Set-theoretic definition of natural numbers, Theory of descriptions, Type theory, Tensor product of graphs, Unity of the proposition
